Text: is there any way to play this game?
@babak160 yes flash your PS3 with CFW there are several varities out there. Then just use a backup manager to play the games you own ;)
go to youtube and wtite cfw 3.55
I've finished downloading and launched it in Multi Man but when i start the game it just goes into a black screen and i've waited for 5 mins nothing happens. . . HELP!
you need to download pkg for this game

I'm on kmeaw 3.55 and I was able to run this game but in a pretty weird way.
Downloaded the game, Installed Every 3.55 pkg out there (Black Screen). But somehow after I installed 3.41 Blus30161 (US) pkg and then copied then moved the games archieves folder inside hdd0/game/blus30161/USRDIR, The game now starts w/o any probs.
